subject: Television
United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Women's Rights
lead_paragraph: Billie Jean King unified her fellow players, won the Battle of the Sexes and secured equal purses at the United States Open. The game would never be the same.
snippet: Billie Jean King unified her fellow players, won the Battle of the Sexes and secured equal purses at the United States Open. The game would never be the same.
